game.title: How to play
items: Join by clicking the join button
The first person to reach 50m wins.

features.title: Game features
items: If there is no winner by the 10th day, the prize money will be carried over
You can participate up to 10 times a day
In case of re-entry (boost) on the same day, the previous run on the same day is invalid
2 STEEM is consumed for non-participation days.
Re-entry (boost) is not possible on non-participation days

reward.title: Rewards
items: 1st place gets 15% of the prize pool
When participating in the game, voting is performed on the latest post of the participating account
We plan to make sure that the voting amount is more than the participation amount as much as possible.

etc.title: Etc.
items: 10% power up of prize pool at end of round
5% maintenance fee of prize pool at the end of round
